level_1.name: Adaptive Modification
level_1.description: Change one target per character level to survive a hostile environment

level_1.name: Biometric Imposture
level_1.description: Cast Instantly to fool any biometric identification device

level_1.name: Font of Persistent Life
level_1.description: Stabilize all nearby mortally wounded targets at 1 System Strain/target healed

level_1.name: Reinforce Tissue
level_1.description: Heal a visible wounded target by 2d6 hit points, more if cast at a higher level

level_1.name: Siphon Strain
level_1.description: Touch a target to shift one System Strain/level to the caster's total

level_1.name: Superficial Tissue Sculpture
level_1.description: Shape surface tissue and coloration in a target as desired; persists as a Change

level_1.name: Temporary Limb
level_1.description: The target sprouts extra manipulatory limbs as a Change

level_1.name: Truth of Flesh and Bone
level_1.description: Diagnose a target; gain +2 on Heal checks on them. Sense magical transformation

level_2.name: Disjunctive Shift
level_2.description: Shift objects into metadimensional storage and carry them with you

level_2.name: Feral Guise
level_2.description: A touched target gains the shape of a non-sentient animal as a Change

level_2.name: Flowing Form
level_2.description: Turn liquid for one round per level, flowing through holes and along walls

level_2.name: Means of Ascent
level_2.description: Only usable with a shape-altering spell; allows flight in the new shape

level_2.name: Sanctity of Self
level_2.description: Instant defense to ignore 3 HP damage/level for one System Strain and an action

level_2.name: Temporary Excellence
level_2.description: Let a visible target treat Strength or Dexterity as 18 for 1 System Strain/round

level_2.name: Ten Thousand Senses
level_2.description: A touched target gets a new sense that exists in some creature as a Change

level_2.name: Toxin Purge
level_2.description: Purge a poison or disease in a visible target for 1 System Strain

level_3.name: Manifest Aspect
level_3.description: Become an arbitrary organic shape as a Change and gain various benefits

level_3.name: Perpetual Molding
level_3.description: Permanently alter a willing target's shape within the parameters of their kind

level_3.name: Physical Perfection
level_3.description: Grant a visible target boosted attributes and hit points while Deep Focus is held

level_3.name: Proprioceptive Crash
level_3.description: Cripple a visible foe's ability to control their body until they save

level_3.name: Resolve Strain
level_3.description: Shed one System Strain per two levels, rounded down. Usable once per day

level_3.name: Restore Organ
level_3.description: Repair organ or limb loss or damage in a willing or unconscious subject

level_3.name: Return to the Root
level_3.description: Dispel the magic of physical transformations or mental influences

level_3.name: Sensory Leech
level_3.description: Use Light Focus to eavesdrop on a target's sensory impressions

level_4.name: Accelerando
level_4.description: Grant a target a bonus Main Action per round so long as Deep Focus is held

level_4.name: Arcane Cyst
level_4.description: Encyst a spell in your flesh to cast it later as an On Turn action

level_4.name: Balance of Power
level_4.description: Shuffle attribute points in a willing target as a Change

level_4.name: Mask of Passion
level_4.description: Pick an emotion and a visible target; shift to force that emotion in them

level_4.name: Polymorphous Pervasity
level_4.description: Swap shapes with a visible target instantly, whether or not they're willing

level_4.name: Sloughing Curse
level_4.description: Inflict continuous rotting damage on a target until a save is made. Induces Surge

level_5.name: Bodily Panoply
level_5.description: Transform body parts to gain functions equivalent to TL4 tech

level_5.name: Compel Change
level_5.description: An Instant adjunct spell that lets alteration spells affect even unwilling targets

level_5.name: Eternal Persistence
level_5.description: While this spell is maintained as a Change, the target is eternally young

level_5.name: Mend the Shattered Vessel
level_5.description: Grant resurrection to a body with an intact brain as a temporary Change

level_5.name: One In All
level_5.description: Explode as a swarm when mortally wounded; regenerate if any survive

level_5.name: Rectify
level_5.description: Completely reset a target's physical health, at considerable cost to the Rectifier
